text: Richard Merrill Rosenbaum (April 8, 1931 – July 28, 2019) was an American lawyer, political activist, boxer, and author who served as a judge of the New York Supreme Court.Richard Rosenbaum, former state Supreme Court justice, dies ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2019 deaths Category:20th-century American lawyers Category:Activists from Rochester, New York Category:American judges Category:American male boxers Category:Lawyers from Rochester, New York Category:New York (state) Republicans Category:New York Supreme Court Justices
title: Richard Rosenbaum
